name: Corpo Classification (Original)
author: Dr. Smint Corpo
rationale: Based on the breach hypothesis - phenomena represent failures in the boundary between observed and unobserved reality

name: Physical Effects Schema
author: Archive Committee
rationale: Organized by the type of effect on observer - rejected Corpo's theoretical framing as unscientific

name: Persistence Taxonomy
author: Archon Vells
rationale: Focused on whether phenomena persist - inspired by Vells' observation that some sites are more stable than others

name: Observer Interaction Model
author: Dendra Coss
rationale: Based on how phenomena respond to observation - does it ignore, react to, attack, or absorb the observer?

name: Unified Archive Schema
author: Archivist Dren
rationale: Attempted synthesis of prior schemas - still in use but increasingly criticized
